project.title: Welcome Bot (TIRA - TIMSCDR Intelligent Robot Assistant)
project.institute: Thakur Institute of Management Studies, Career Development & Research (TIMSCDR)
project.description: TIRA (TIMSCDR Intelligent Robot Assistant) is an interactive information assistant designed to provide real-time details about the institute’s courses, departments, events, and achievements. The robot uses AI with voice-based interaction to answer questions related to TIMSCDR and assist students and visitors efficiently.

technology_used.description: IoT with integration of Artificial Intelligence using Raspberry Pi, speech recognition, and conversational RAG model.

applications: Acts as an interactive information assistant that provides real-time institute updates.
Helps automate front-desk query handling using voice commands.
Provides AI-based context-aware responses regarding faculty, courses, and college events.
Demonstrates integration of IoT, AI, and NLP technologies in a real-world educational setup.

contact_info.address: Thakur Educational Campus, Shyamnarayan Thakur Marg, Thakur Village, Kandivali (East), Mumbai - 400101, Maharashtra, India

ai_behavior.greeting_response: Hey there! I'm TIRA, your friendly TIMSCDR Bot. How can I help you today?
out_of_context_response: I'm not sure about that, but you can ask me anything related to TIMSCDR!
As per my knowledge, I don't have info on that yet. Want to know about the institute?
Sorry, that’s outside my knowledge. I can help with TIMSCDR-related queries instead.
